/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the urban landscape. In the center of the image, a large tree stands tall, its lush green foliage contrasting with the man-made structures around it. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, completing the picture of a typical day in this bustling city.
